channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 63 – Kexbrough
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
:) I only drink diet coke here, as I do everywhere.
And we almost went by bicycle (also a type of bike) but you can't really go into the country with a bicycle (no roads)
item.content:encoded:
:) I only drink diet coke here, as I do everywhere.

And we almost went by bicycle (also a type of bike) but you can’t really go into the country with a bicycle (no roads)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Why walking when u have a bike? ;) What did u drink there?
item.content:encoded: Why walking when u have a bike? ;) What did u drink there?
